name: The Chicken Of Pelda
description:
WASD to move. Left click or "J" to throw. Right click or "K" to drink potion.

Press "R" to reset level if you get stuck or die.

Combine items to create potions in order to make it through the forest to get the buttered chicken.

Made by Clarke Haight for Jame Gam 25.

Update: Uploaded new build that makes explosions work.

2nd Update: Hopefully made the game beatable.
